    Method
    Description
    <T> ActorRef<T>
    ActorSystem.actorOf(String actorName, T object)
    Creates a new actor with the specified name and object.
    <T> ActorRef<T>

    Add the directly generated Actor to the ActorSystem.
    <T> ActorRef<T>
    ActorSystem.addActor(ActorRef<T> actor, String actorName)
